testSteps.description: Given I am at the LiveTraffic Website
When I Navigate to Legend section

Then I should see below "Incident" details
| Legend_Details |
| Crash |
| Roadworks |
| Breakdown |
| Changed traffic conditions |

Then I should see below "Traffic Conditions" details
| Legend_Details |
| Heavy |
| Moderate |
| Low |

Then I should see below "Other road incidents" details
| Legend_Details |
| Public event |
| Traffic signals fault |
| General hazard |

Then I should see below "Weather and natural events" details
| Legend_Details |
| Fire |
| Flood |
| Snow/Ice |
| Adverse Weather |

And I should see below "Lines on the map" details
| Legend_Details |
| Road closures published by TMC |
| Road closures by Google Maps |
| Traffic flow by Google Maps |
| These red lines indicate road closures due to an incident on Live Traffic NSW |
| Live Traffic NSW uses Google Maps as its base map. These closure lines are provided by Google, not the TMC, and may not relate to an incident on Live Traffic NSW. |
| These coloured lines are provided by Google Maps and provide an indication of current traffic flow. Conditions range from green (fast) to red (slow) and dark red (very slow). |
